Aur bhai PIYUSH (Main tujhe hmesha piyush hi bulata hu).. Kaisa hai ğŸ’™
Mze mein hi hoga... as usual !!!
Tera likha memoir padhne ke baad yaad aaya ki apan 3 saal se roommate the ğŸ¤... Yeh toh bas Naam ke hi 3 saal hai... Asal Mein toh tu poori raat baahar hi rehta tha.... Din mein bhi kabhi kabhi bas wing mein dikhta tha... Khair jitna bhi time Saath spend kiya, mze toh bahut aaye... Baat Baat pe tereko sunana.. Agar geele kapde room mein sukaye toh tere bed ka gadda nikaal ke Baahar fek dunga ğŸ˜…ğŸ˜… Mza aata tha Yeh sab bolke.... But still... Oh my god! mera selection ho gaya will be our favourite ğŸ˜

Ek or secret Baat btata hu... Kaafi baar teri late night call pe baate sunke jaag Aa jaati thi and fir chupke se kambal mein hi teri or uski baate sunta tha ğŸ‘­ğŸ‘©â€â¤ï¸â€ğŸ’‹â€ğŸ‘¨.... ğŸ˜Š

Or haa 1 or Baat.... Jab subah class se 5 min pehle hi uthna hota hai toh alarm 1/2 - 1 ghante pehle ki kyu? Aakhir kyu?  Har baar tujhe class jaate time hi uthata tha.. Tab hi uthta tha tu. ğŸ˜’

Bas ab fir placement mein keval bangalore waali companies Mein hi apply karna... Saath mein toh nhi (ğŸ‘«*) ğŸ˜ Par Paas waale flat mein jarur rahenge âœŒï¸ Or placement ki tips lete rehna apne seniors se(tera roommate bhi senior ho gaya ab tere se) ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ğŸ¤£ğŸ¤£

Ab kuch palo ke liye alvida lene ka time Aa Gaya..... ğŸ˜”
